Name: Eldritch University
About the game: The nightmare is not over. Kasumi Kawamura just wants to get through university while rekindling her relationship with her girlfriend. But not long after she arrives at school, a strange epidemic starts to infect the city, causing the afflicted to have terrible nightmares and lose the motivation to live their lives. Coinciding with the appearance of this 'Nightmare Syndrome', an old wound that Kasumi thought healed starts to burn and cause frightening visions to those around her. Caught in the center of this situation, Kasumi and her friends try desperately to find a solution. Yet all the while, Kasumi wonders if she might be to blame... Features: Multiple endings. Choosing poorly often leads to death, but it can also damage the relationship between Kasumi and her girlfriend. Continue the story. The nightmare was seemingly over thanks to Yue and her friends, but something was left unfinished. Discover connections. Shizuka and Yuri, from the Shireishi anthology, return to investigate another paranormal occurrence. Watch the aftermath. Aside from the usual bonus features, the game also includes a set of stories that take place after the nightmare's end, hinting at new beginnings.
